p: Glucocorticoids have been commonly used in patients with SARS-CoV or MERS-CoV infection [ 74, 75]. Glucocorticoids prolonged the survival time of SARS cases [ 75]. Patients with COVID-19 were given glucocorticoids in some hospitals in China. However, the mortality rate did not decrease with corticosteroid treatment in patients infected with SARS-CoV-2, and viral clearance was not delayed [ 6, 74]. Therefore, it is still controversial whether corticosteroids should be used to treat SARS-CoV-2 infections [ 69].
